patthana8.51:1.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana8.51:2.1: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho ca naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana8.51:3.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhañca naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.51:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
